name: F-Class Destiny Hunter
author: anamin
content: In a world of abilities known as fortunes, Seo Gangrim brings misfortune to those around him. Despite his low rank, people fear his power to steal fortunes from the dead.After his entire sect is annihilated by an assassin, Gangrim returns to the past, desperate to prevent its grisly end. He intends to make a difference this time but realizes that even fortunes aren&#039t set in stone.Will Gangrim be able to save his comrades from their unjust deaths, or will he only bring doom to them all again?
